txt.en: DNT - Defeated Gwengorn the White Stag
Gwengorn has fled! He's heading up the hill!
Gwengorn has fled into the hills of the southern Wildwood.\n\nYou should pursue Gwengorn.
Gwengorn wasn't fleeing! He led you here
Linnet is located in the south-central Wildwood.\n\nYou should talk to Linnet Redholm.
Gwengorn has led you to a sprung trap in the southern Wildwood.\n\nYou should examine the trap.

'He got away from you, did he? Sometimes this is the way of things. Perhaps I will come across him one day.\n\n'It sounds like you did a good deed while you were out there as well. I suppose you got closer to Gwengorn than ever I was able.'

'The rumours that drew me here made mention of Gwengorn, a stag with a coat like snow and antlers that rise above the tree tops. I am less inclined to give credence to that last bit, but a white stag would be quite the catch!'
Tales of a marvellous white stag who can be found in the Wildwood have reached the ears of Linnet Redholm.
DNT - Defeat Gwengorn the White Stag
The white stag can be found in the south-western Wildwood.\n\nLinnet has asked you to defeat Gwengorn the white stag.
